name: The Treasure Is Not Real
description:
You are a cartographer trying to verify as much treasure map as possible in this papers please like game.

This is my thrid ever game created for the 2022.1 Brackeys Game Jam under a week.

The theme was "it is not real". In this game you are trying to solve what makes a treasure map a real map, and not a counterfeit one. With each new information it becomes increasingly more and more difficult the remember every detail.

How many maps can you identify under the sort timeframe, and become the ultimate cartographer of the world.

Credits:

Art assets: under_score_lab  

https://under-score-lab.itch.io/cartography-pack

Music: KamaleshSIddu from Pixabay
